oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A unified description of elastic, high energy electron - Molecule scattering
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BASAVARAJU, G
BHARATHI, SM
BHUSHAN, KG
MAJI, S
PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: range
co2
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a unified description of elastic, high energy electron - molecule scattering in terms of a scaled differential cross section regarded as a universal function of a scaled momentum transfer. The predictions of the function are in agreement with the experimental cross sections for CH4, C2H4, C2H6, CO, N-2, O-2 H2O and CO2.
